name: Tulix Systems
tag_list: streaming, live, cdn, stream, video, mobile, iptv, app, broadcast, broadcasting
overview: Tulix Systems has become a premier technology partner for content producers, channels and businesses who want to distribute high quality video and audio content to large numbers of viewers. Tulix Systems, located in Atlanta, GA, provides peerless CDN services to the major Tier 1 backbone providers as well as to over one hundred national and regional providers. Combined with high-powered streaming and routing optimization, Tulix Systems CDN services are optimum for live streaming and which this quality carries over to all levels including on-demand services. Tulix Systems add-on ancillary services include single stream encoding for multiple devices, time shifting, virtual DVR as well as authorized device application development for PC, iPhone/iPod touch, iPad, BlackBerry, Android and Roku. Tulix Systems CDN services and applications meet the needs of conventional pay-tv operators, virtual multi-service operators and all classes of media companies.
